Player History
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 3/3/1987 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 8/18/1989 with a Fractured Knee, out for 5-6 weeks...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Detroit on 7/5/1990 (Going to PIT: 1B J.T. Snow, P Xavier Hernandez. Going to DET: 1B Ron Coomer, RF Bobby Bonilla)...
Had first career hit on 4/15/1992, off Gregg Olson (OAK)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/7/1992, off Mark Eichhorn (TOR)...
